product_name: Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and nimble with materials that are perfect for warm, dry climates, the women's Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots offer plenty of comfort and stability for trips on your favorite trails. Split leather and nubuck leather uppers provide durable, flexible support; over-the-ankle coverage adds support on rocky trails. Synthetic linings wick moisture away from feet to increase comfort. Polyurethane midsoles and nylon shanks provide lasting comfort and support. Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots boast Vibram(R) Renovo rubber outsoles with an aggressive tread pattern to deliver a stable base and all-terrain traction. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and nimble with materials that are perfect for warm, dry climates, the women's Lowa Tempest QC Hiking Boots offer plenty of comfort and stability for trips on your favorite trails.
